column1: |                    | Nominated postal or parcels train; or                                         |
|                    | Breakdown or overhead line equipment train going to clear the line (IZ99); or |
|                    | Traction unit going to assist a failed train (1Z99)                           |
|                    | Snow plough going to clear the line (1Z99)                                    |
| 3                  | Freight train if specially authorised; or                                     |
|                    | Empty coaching stock train if specially authorised                            |
| 4                  | Freight train which can run up to 75 mph (120 km/h)                           |
| 6                  | Freight train which can run up to 60 mph (95 km/h)                            |
| 7                  | Freight train which can run up to 45 mph (70 km/h)                            |
| 8                  | Freight train which can run up to 35 mph (55 km/h)                            |
|                    | Other passenger train if specially authorised                                 |
|                    | Leeds or Lincoln via Nottingham to St Pancras                                 |
|                    | Scarborough/York/Leeds via Sheffield to St Pancras                            |
|                    | St Pancras to Leeds/Lincoln/Derby via Nottingham                              |
